{"step_by_step_thinking": "Ustekinumab is a monoclonal antibody, not a polyclonal antibody. Monoclonal antibodies are produced from a single clone of cells and are therefore identical, while polyclonal antibodies are produced from multiple clones of cells and are therefore a mixture of different antibodies. Ustekinumab specifically targets and blocks the action of certain proteins in the immune system, making it a monoclonal antibody.", "answer_choice": "B"}
